content:
I'm creating an IG using the standard template and latest build - I have a number of questions:

1) What controls the text in the HTML Title element - I can't seem to find it.

2) How do I stop Turtle being generated

3) I have my profiles "grouped" - is it possible to get an artefact list per group as a separate file, as opposed to a section in the main artefact list.

1. It's generated by the IG Publisher - gets set in the pages\_data\pages.json file
  2. Right now, in your ig.ini, add a line that says excludettl = Yes. (We'll be moving this into the ImplementationGuide 'soon'
  3. All things are possible, but there's no explicit support for this right now. The current list is created by a transform. You could have a transform that spits out group-specific files. Don't yet have good support for child templates adding their own transforms/scripting, though that's on the list for the next month or so
well, #3 might not be true depending on what the "separate file" is - there's several mechanisms that might meet the requirement, depending on what it is

1. It's generated by the IG Publisher - gets set in the pages\_data\pages.json file

Hmm - I don't have that file at all

only in temp

Doesn't seem to be the right place to set it then. Looks like it takes it from the <id> value of the implementation guide - not obvious :-)
you still haven't clarified exactly what you are looking for

you still haven't clarified exactly what you are looking for

I was looking to see where the title tag of the generated HTML page gets its name from. - I found it (as above)
